mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `festival` (fsv_name, fsv_tel, fsv_start, fsv_end, fsv_orgimg, fsv_thumb, fsv_add, fsv_lat, fsv_lon) VALUES (#{fsv_name}, #{fsv_tel}, #{fsv_start}, #{fsv_end}, #{fsv_orgimg}, #{fsv_thumb}, #{fsv_add}, #{fsv_lat}, #{fsv_lon})
mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by fsv_id desc) as fsv_no, fsv_id, fsv_name, fsv_start, fsv_end fsv_orgimg from festival f) festival2 where festival2.fsv_no between ${start} and ${end}
SELECT * FROM `festival` WHERE fsv_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')

select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by fsv_id desc) as fsv_no, fsv_id, fsv_name, fsv_orgimg from festival f WHERE fsv_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')) AS festival2 where festival2.fsv_no between #{start} and #{end}
